tool_description: Gain exclusive access to a handpicked selection of games that leading gaming platforms give away periodically, including PlayStation, Epic Games Store, Xbox, Prime Gaming, and more.
name: Free games this month
title: Free games this month

api_list.name: Get recent gift games
api_list.description: It returns the same of `available` endpoint but it will trim a period date. This is useful, for example, to create alerts and notifications with ONLY recent data.

api_list.name: Get available gift games
api_list.description: Full list of current available free games.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://free-games-this-month.p.rapidapi.com/games/gifts/available"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "free-games-this-month.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://free-games-this-month.p.rapidapi.com/games/gifts/available"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "free-games-this-month.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
